reviews.review:
OG Review: The real killer is the post game chat. Good game, toxic community.

New Review: The game itself is fun but it is ruined by a toxic community and f*cking incompetent developers. I had no internet for a while and last played on 9th March 2021 when I come back on the 21st I have a UNEXPLAINED VAC ban meaning I cannot play the game, I know I have never cheated on the game and the most toxic thing I have did is facecamp and say "good luck you fu*king donkeys" as my name is Gordon Ramsay.

There are hundreds of game-breaking bugs that go years back that has never been fixed, they released a test update on PTB and when 99.9% of people said they didn't want it they still went through with it. The best thing about this game was being able to play as Steve. I have wasted so many hours on it, and so much money on auric cells, dlc and even some cosmetics just to be banned for no reason.

The real killer now is the game developers.
:D
arrumaram a hit box ^^
flex
Fun game, kinda takes time to get used to the gameplay if you haven't played something similar though.

Saw people playing this game for ages but didnt get it until the Silent Hill chapter (I'm a massive fan). It's super fun as survivor for the thrill of being chased- survival horror fans like me will probably love it. Playing killer is just pure excitement too. I used to think the QTE's were kinda BS, but now I do see how they help balance gameplay for the killer. My biggest complaint is how the different status effects like Broken and such are sort of vaguely described and finding an explanation isn't easy. It took a lot of playing to figure out what everything meant.

This game is infuriating, yet fun and addictive. When you play killer and get to higher ranks, you get matched up with the notorious Survive With Friends survivors, which is where the infuriating gameplay begins (you'll see what I mean when you get 0 downs, looped, and teabagged for 15 minutes straight). The devs really should balance SWF gameplay for killers (unlikely to happen), so if you can get passed this one issue with the game, the rest of it is VERY fun and addictive, with a reasonably high skillcap for those who want to git gud.

Ragazzi mi sono ricollegato a DBD dopo 2 anni che non ci mettevo piede.
Ed e tutto peggiorato, sconsiglio a chiunque di comprare il prodotto perche non vale 20E.
Per correttezza devo dire che il gioco in se merita MA :

°Il matchmaking e pessimo dove tu di rank 3/4 puoi essere matchato con gente del 17/20 (e non solo 1 a partita )
°Chi gioca Killer e per la maggior parte delle volte un frustrato che appena possibile Camperera e fara Tunelling
°Il tutto comporta che la Comunity e di un tossico che quasi raggiunge quella presente su LOL sul podio.
°Siccome la gente e frustrata , le probabilita  che un alleato si disconetta sono di UNO su 3 game.
° Scalare i rank come se per i motivi sopracitati non fosse abbastanza , si aggiunge un sistema di punti  che fa diventare il gioco un ARCADE , se tu non giochi in una determinata maniera , ovvero ARCADE il gioco ti penalizza.
Di conseguenza il gioco smette di essere un Survival Horror e diventa un ACCHIAPARELLA. 

Basterebbe che gli sviluppatori aggiustassero il sistema di rank rendendolo meno punitivo per i SURVIVAL, ed impedendo la retrocessione in caso di alleato che RAGEQUITTA oppure nel caso ci si salvi dalla partita.
E Scoraggiassero i Killer che camperano e fanno Tunneling facendogli prendere meno punti se in prossimita del Uncino o che colpiscono piu volte lo stesso  giocatore dopo che e stato salvato dall uncino.

IN BREVE : Se avete pazienza e non vi importa del giudizio altrui e un ottimo gioco . 
Se la COMMUNITY (anche perche dovete giocare con altre 3 persone a partita) vi pesa
Se  vi scoccia rimanere appesi come un salame finche un alleato non vi salva e subito dopo rifinire a terra di nuovo.
Se volete un SURVIVAL HORROR 
NON e il gioco per voi!

Игра в которой хитбоксы у манов несовместимые вещи. Игра в которой Барбекю и чили делает все за мана. Дбд- это игра в которой наед делает всю работу. Если тебе попался Доктор или Рин с барбекю, то можно сразу ливать. Разработчики данной игры забили большой болт на геймплей и добавляют новых маннов с новыми хуевыми скинами. 
Спустя полгода, я снова зашел в эту игру и в 1 игре доктор ударяя по стене, попадает по мне. 1/10

I have 116 hours right now, and I've been running into red and purple ranks as a rank 11 killer. The emblems are based on players of equivalent skills, but the player ranks are not equivalent. What is being asked of me right now is basically play at the skill levels of players with 1000+ hours at 100 hours or earn less points and get my perks slower. Please fix the match making.

One year on and the devs don't listen to the community at all. Overall a horrible game if you don't play in house so don't bother buying it.
Definite improvement in latency. Thank goodness. Reversing back to postive review

Developers have made a great game, but matchmaking with crossplay needs work. I mainly play on console and the community is pretty toxic, making it a little inaccessible for new players.

If you play survivor, you'll run into others who will rage quit or intentionally ruin the match. If you play killer, it's even more unforgiving if you're new. You'll run into survivors well above your skill level - which in theory isn't bad because you need to learn how to play - but also they'll intentionally body-block.

If you play cross-play on PC, you'll have the advantage in using a mouse combined with higher, consistent framerates. I do recommend it for PC if you have multiple gaming platforms and decide to get the game.

Matchmaking however is pretty bad right now, and I can't recommend it at the moment overall because of it. It's not really a level playing field and it's poorly balanced. It forces you to play survivor to earn enough in-game currency to buy killer perks to balance out being matchmaked with experienced and toxic players.

The developer is good nonetheless and they've consistently added content over the years and balanced out issues. I feel they'll fix this issue.
